name: Elemental Sorcerer
description:
A mini metroidvania where the player can infuse their equipment with the power of the elements. Bevy Jam #2 submission

Controls
  • A/D - move left/right
  • Space - jump
  • E - interact
  • Left click - cast ability (if equipt)
  • R - reload from last checkpoint

Acknowledgements
  • This asset pack was used for most of the sprites and tiles.
  • Background music was taken from this music pack by jhaeka.
  • Other sound effects created using Chiptone.
